body:
Totally disappointed.
I came for the Bestiality/Dog-Tag, I went through the whole Manga... twice!
...
There is NOT a single Page with even a Dog on it! Instead there were some Pages where some kind of Monster tries to tentacle-rape the girl, but thats it...

Seriously, am I blind? If so just tell me WHERE for heavens sake is that stupid Dog I wanted to see...

0/10
